text: Patriarch George II may refer to: * Patriarch George II of Alexandria, ruled in 1021–1051 * George II of Constantinople, Ecumenical Patriarch in 1191–1198 * George II Beseb'ely, Maronite Patriarch of Antioch in 1657–1670 * Patriarch Ignatius George II, head of the Syriac Orthodox Church in 1687–1708
title: Patriarch George II
